job_history.work_description: Set up store prior to grand opening. Selected products to be sold. Priced accordingly. Placed product to the sales floor. Worked as a team member performing cashier duties, product assistance and cleaning. Cross-trained and provided back-up for other customer service representatives when needed. Expressed appreciation and invited customers to return to the store. Organized the store by returning all merchandise to its proper place.

job_history.role_name: Club Manager/Assistant Manager · Sales Manager/Assistant Manager · Operations Manager
job_history.work_description: Managed all operational areas of busy fitness club with 6 direct reports, a total staff of 30, and 400-800 daily patrons. Operational areas included Customer Service, Programs, Personal Training, Retail Sales, Kids' Club, Maintenance, and Financial Management (Payroll, Accounts Receivable, Sales Reporting, Budget Management). Responded quickly to customer inquiries and issues to maintain a high level of member satisfaction/retention. Influenced prospects, sold memberships and accounted for cash/credit card receipts. Conducted facility tours and new member orientations; developed new member fitness goals. Scheduled appointments and registered patrons for classes, personal training, and fitness sessions. Drove revenue growth through referrals by building positive and enduring relationships with members. Processed all contracts, payments, and membership corrections.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience handling customer inquiries and issues, maintaining a high level of member satisfaction and retention, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Sales Management
skills.explanation: Successfully managed sales operations, drove revenue growth through referrals, and sold memberships, suggesting strong proficiency in sales management.

skills.name: Operations Management
skills.explanation: Effectively managed all operational areas of a busy fitness club, including customer service, programs, personal training, retail sales, and financial management, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll, accounts receivable, sales reporting, and budget management, showing a solid working proficiency in financial management.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed a team of 6 direct reports and a total staff of 30, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Effectively scheduled appointments and registered patrons for classes, personal training, and fitness sessions, showing a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Developed new member fitness goals and conducted facility tours and new member orientations, indicating a solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Worked as a team member and provided back-up for other customer service representatives when needed, showing a solid working proficiency in teamwork.
